abstract: Hewlett-Packard said on Thursday that it has named Ralph V. Whitworth, the head of the hedge fund Relational Investors, to its board as the computer giant seeks to head off potential campaigns by activist shareholders. Read the entire post on Dealbook..
snippet: Hewlett-Packard said on Thursday that it has named Ralph V. Whitworth, the head of the hedge fund Relational Investors, to its board as the computer giant seeks to head off potential campaigns by activist shareholders. Read the entire post on Deal...
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard said on Thursday that it had named Ralph V. Whitworth, head of the hedge fund Relational Investors, to its board of directors as the computer giant seeks to fend off potential campaigns by activist shareholders. Read the entire post on Dealbook..

headline.main: Dealbook: H.P. Gives Relational’s Whitworth a Board Seat
